rooms.name: Entrance Hall
rooms.description: A welcoming space with a reception desk and storage area, designed to optimize flow into the main living areas. Features a Vastu-compliant directional placement.

rooms.name: Open-plan Kitchen & Living Area
rooms.description: A spacious open-plan layout combining modern kitchen appliances with comfortable seating and dining area, enhanced by floor-to-ceiling windows to maximize natural light. The layout respects Vastu principles for the living space.

rooms.name: Studio Apartment
rooms.description: A split-level studio apartment featuring a sleeping loft area accessible via a staircase within the room, ensuring privacy and efficient use of vertical space. The design incorporates Vastu principles for energy flow and balance.

openings.description: Floor-to-ceiling windows that allow abundant natural light and enhance the open-plan feel.
